p: Analytical grade reagents acetate buffer, 2,4,6-tripyridyl-s-triazine (TPTZ), HCl, FeCl 3, Folin-Ciocalteu reagent,2,6-di- tert-butyl-4-methylphenol (BHT), n-butanol (BuOH), acetone, ethyl acetate, sodium bicarbonate, 1,10-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrzyl (DPPH), absolute ethanol (96%, v/ v), sodium bicarbonate and methanol were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). Acetonitrile, water, and methanol (HPLC grade) were purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). Reference HPLC standards, gallic acid, pyrogallol, protocatechuic acid, chlorogenic acid, procyanidin B2, vanilic acid, caffeic acid, syringic acid, epicatechin, p-coumric acid, ferulic acid, sinapic acid, rutin, hyperoside, isoquercetin, kaempferol-3- O-glukoside, resveratrol, quercetin, kaempferol (purity â‰¥ 99%) were purchased from Extrasynthese (Genay, France).
